full_summary:
## Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
### Solicitation Reference Number: 100024120
#### Advance Contract Award Notice signals the Government’s intention to enter into a Sole Source Contract with Unisys Canada Inc.

* Solicitation Number: 100024120
* Publication Date: September 7, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 22, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Contracting Authority: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC), 140 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0J9, Canada
* Procurement Category Code: SRVTGD
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

## Scope of Work
The Department of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking professional services to supply and install any Unisys Products or Services licenses for Cloud Proof-of-Concepts associated with ESDC’s Unisys based applications systems.  The work will involve the installation of Unisys licensed products, Unisys system engineering services, Unisys products defect root cause analysis, Unisys products remediation, and Unisys product support.

## Contract Term
The proposed Contract is for a period of 28 months, including two additional option periods, with each option period being 12 months.

## Expected Contract Awards
The expected contract award date is October 6, 2023. The expected completion date of the contract is March 31, 2025.

Attachments have been made available at the following links:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8853/100024120-acan-en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8853/100024120-apm.pdf

Contact Information: 
Karine Chamberland, nc-solicitations
